roleset.name: initiation, offer of negotiations/transaction
roleset.note: OVERTURE-N NOTES: Based on noun entry offer.01. No corresponding VN class. Framed by Claire. (from overture.01-n)

role.descr: listener, entity arg1 is proposed, offered to

example.name: make_overture-l
example.text: It's made merger overtures to the board .

example.name: overture-n: All arguments
example.text: His overtures of peace to the barbarians aroused much anger in the Roman army and ultimately led to a mutiny.
